projects.name: Bellum Mechanica
projects.desc: Design an engine capable of automating robo-warfare, then direct your bots to victory against other player-written AI. Inspired by chess, autochess & Battlesnakes

projects.name: An Imperial Simulation
projects.desc: An empire simulator that takes inspiration from Orteil's Neverending Legacy. Build and nurture a settlement in a hostile world.

projects.name: SpawnerJS
projects.desc: Another framework for building Javascript UIs in a functional style. Originally written because I didn't want to learn jQuery.

projects.name: RisutoCrypto
